question: There are 183 fifth-graders at Oak Ridge School. 46 of them are girls. On Thursday, 9 fifth-grade girls and 2 fifth-grade boys were absent. How many fifth grade boys were at Oak Ridge School on Thursday?
answer:
Of the 183 fifth graders, 46 are girls, so 183 students - 46 girls = <<183-46=137>>137 boys.
On Thursday there were 137 boys - 2 absent = <<137-2=135>>135 boys.
#### 135
